data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Separating words in syllables can be useful for many different
    operations regarding natural language processing (going from
    singular to plural is one of them, implemented in
    Lingua::PT::Inflect).

    The process of separation - not a trivial one - is based on rules
    and was implemented with the help of a good grammar.
